Lille Armchair, Blue

Lille Armchair, Blue

The perfect French-style desk for a stylish home office.

Insider
Price £640

£699 in high-end retailers — save 72%

Add to trolley

Edition limited to 12 • only 5 left

Free delivery on MONTPELLIER use voucher code FREE MONTPELLIER at checkout

Also in:

The Details

  • W: 130 cm D: 70 cm H: 76 cm
  • Drawer depth: 40 cm
  • Handcarved kiln-dried mango wood
  • Mortise and tenon joinery
  • Aged limewashed effect finish
  • Deep 40cm drawers that fit a 15'' laptop
  • Plate-and-ring antiqued brass handles

This Edition

The Adele strikes just the right balance between French elegance and a more rustic, pared-back style. So… cabriole legs, check; carving on all sides, check; brass plate-and-ring handles, check. But the limewashed finish gives those signature French elements a clean feel, keeping it very real and very contemporary. The Adele is ideal for working from home, and it can also work as a super-deep dressing table.

The Maker

The workshop is located in the beautiful region of Rajashthan, India. Matthew, our Quality Guardian, relocated to India and visits the artisans several times a week. The owner has been in the furniture business for over 40 years, initially in antique restoration. Impressed with the operation we decided to consolidate the majority of our French-style production here.

Delivery & Returns

  • In production – estimated delivery in late May
  • Two-man delivery service to room of choice
  • £38 per item delivery charge, non-refundable
  • 7 day no quibble returns with free collection

Why shop with us?
